DOC.brief_title: Trichomonas Vaginalis Repeat Infections Among HIV Negative Women
DOC.detailed_description: This study phase III randomize clinical trial . HIV-negative woman test positive TV routine gynecological exam participate clinic refer nurse/study coordinator screen eligibility , provide description study , obtain write , inform consent ( N=700 ) . Subjects undergo audio computer assist self- interview ( ACASI ) , self-collect vaginal swab Trichomonas test InPouch NAAT , Gram stain testing , future microbiome specimen . They randomize one two arm ; metronidazole ( MTZ ) 2 g single dose ( CDC recommend treatment regimen ) MTZ 500 mg BID 7-day dose ( CDC alternative treatment regimen ) . All enrol woman schedule follow-up visit four week post treatment completion ( window 3-13 week ) .
